content:
/>
XII.i.3.F.1.c
.
Consideration of Judgments
It makes no difference
what the judgment amount to the claimant is called, or
whether the judgment compensates for
economic loss, such as loss of income, or
non-economic loss, such as pain and suffering.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F - Prohibition Against Duplication of Benefits
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section F
